Title: Headmaster suspended; students, parents block road
Content: More than 100 schoolchildren boycotted classes and blocked Viralipatti Main Road in front of Perarignanar Anna Centenary New Middle School at Vadakattupatti village in Sanarpatti union on Wednesday, i
Author: Staff Reporter
